Agenta - Hybrid (Berlin) or Remote (CET +/- 5) - Multiple Roles - Full Time

Agenta is an open-source LLM developer platform that provides all the necessary tools for rapidly building reliable LLM applications. Features include prompt management, evaluation, human feedback, and observability. Find out more about us at https://github.com/agenta-ai/agenta

Our tech stack includes Python, FastAPI, MongoDB, Typescript, ReactJS, and NextJS.

We have several positions available:

Founding Product Engineer - Frontend: Ideally, you have previously worked in early-stage startups, can manage features from design to production, and have some background in LLMs.

Founding Product Designer: This role is perfect for someone who has experience designing complex B2B products, ideally developer tools.

You can find more details about these roles here: https://agentaai.notion.site/Careers-at-agenta-fb8a76d4d9044â€¦

If you're interested, please contact us directly at: careers@agenta.ai
